channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mars Rock Hints At Ancient Life—But More Study Needed, NASA Says
item.description: NASA's Mars rover discovered what a scientist calls "the most puzzling, complex and potentially important rock yet investigated by Perseverance."

item.title: A bowl of rice
item.description: It’s expensive. Hundreds of people were involved in getting you that simple bowl of rice. It involved countless gallons of water, hours of labor, gallons of fuel. A complex supply chain that ensured you got what you needed, in perfect condition, just as you were ready for it. And it’s cheap. The amount of time […]

item.title: The Resurgence Of Crypto VC Investing: Navigating The New Bull Run
item.description: The crypto VC market's gradual rebound, despite bitcoin's fluctuating performance, tells a story of strategic optimism.

item.title: The two bicycle errors
item.description: Momentum activities like public speaking, board sports and leadership all share an attribute with riding a bicycle: It gets easier when you get good at it. The first error we often make is believing that someone (even us) will never be good at riding a bike, because riding a bike is so difficult. When we’re […]

item.title: Why ‘Elden Ring’ Fans Should Play ‘Dark Souls’
item.description: Why Elden Ring DLC fans should consider going back to the beginning, to the original (or remastered) Dark Souls.

item.title: Doing it step by step
item.description: I was surprised to discover that for many AI questions, if you add, “please figure this out step by step,” the AI will provide a dramatically more accurate and useful answer. This works on simple questions like, “how many times does the letter ‘r’ appear in the word ‘strawberry'” to much more complex issues. It […]

item.title: Cohere AI’s $500 Million Series D, Musk’s Memphis Gigagactory, Cuts At Magic Leap, Meta Reality Labs
item.description: Cohere is now valued at $5.5 Billion. Meta’s got four major-ish items in the news, including the release of a new open-source LLM, Llama 3.

item.title: Patterns and chaos
item.description: Finding a pattern that explains events that seem like chaos is a breakthrough. It offers us understanding and a lever we can use to make an impact. Sometimes, though, the breakthrough lies in understanding that there is no pattern, simply unpredictable noise. We need effort to find patterns. We need humility to accept the chaos.

item.title: Covid Outbreak Among Olympic Athletes Serves As A Pandemic Reminder
item.description: Members of the Australian women's water polo team contracted Covid-19 days before the Paris Summer Olympic Games. A look at the 2024 health protocols compared with 2021.

item.title: Hungry (vs. not full)
item.description: If consumption is the point (the engine of the economy, the focus of our marketing, the driver of our status) then it’s easy to get confused about the difference between something that’s nearly empty (and must be refilled to ensure we keep going) and something that’s not quite full (which means that there’s room for […]
